Subject: Official Request

Dear Sir/Madam,

Mero naam [Tapaiko Naam] ho ra ma [Department ya Position] ma chu. Ma hajur sanga [request ko reason] bhanera sampark gardai chu. Kripaya malaai yo email ko lagi assistance dinuhos. Tapai ko samaya ra sahayog ko lagi dhanyabad.

Regards,
[Tapaiko Naam]

instruction: Raat ko time ma movie recommend gar.
output: Comedy genre ma Nepali movie 'Jatra' ya 'Kabaddi' ekdum ramailo huncha. Aba raat ma ramailo tarikale enjoy garna saknu huncha.

instruction: Ek motivational story sunau.
output: Ekjana kisan ko goru nalageko thiyo, ani usko jamin jhaskera mathi pugcha. Kisanle sochcha 'Aba goru nikalnu sakdina,' ra jaminkai mathi dhulo chodna thalcha. Goru le afno khutta le dhulo kilera mathi uthcha ani bistarai jamin mathi pugcha. Tyo kisan sikcha, 'Problem auda ni harkaile try garna parcha.'

instruction: Nepali ma birthday wish garna line suggest gar.
output: Happy Birthday! Timi ko din dherai ramailo hos, sapana haru pura hoss ra timro jindagi hamesha khushi le bhari rahos!

instruction: Nepali traditional dress ko benefits lekha.
output:
1. Daura suruwal ra gunyu cholo jasto dress le Nepali culture represent garcha.
2. Comfortable ra eco-friendly huncha.
3. Formal occasions jasto tika, pasni ma perfect huncha.

instruction: Ek healthy breakfast recipe suggest gar.
output:
1. Oats lai water ma boil garera pakaunus.
2. Tyo ma milk, honey, ani seasonal fruits jastai apple ra banana milau.
3. Top ma nuts jastai almond ya cashew rakhna milcha.

instruction: Ek funny question sodhnu.
output: Kukur haru sunda k dream dekchhan hola? Timro bichar ke ho?

instruction: Nepal ma dherai use garne proverbs ko example de.
output:
1. Haat ma chura huda pani bhokai.
2. Nau din ma ghasko paani.
3. Jati bela suga lai sikauna khocha, tei bela bhagra lagcha.

instruction: Travel tips diyera help gar.
input: Nepal visit garna jana lageko manche lai.
output:
1. Light ra comfortable clothes pack gar.
2. Trekking jaane ho bhane ramro shoes lya.
3. Local food try garne, jastai momo, dal bhat.
4. Always bottled water piu.

instruction: Ek sustainable living ko tip de.
output: Plastic ko jagga ma cloth bag use gar. Reusable bottle ani straw le pani help garcha.

instruction: Pet lai ramailo garna activity suggest gar.
output:
1. Fetch khelau.
2. Dog-friendly park ma walk gar.
3. New trick sikau jastai 'sit' ya 'shake hand'.

instruction: Nepali ma ramailo riddle bana.
output:
Ma din ma dekhinchhu, raat ma harauchhu. Ma ke ho?
Answer: Chhaya (Shadow)

instruction: Nepali ma ek ramro Instagram caption suggest gar.
output: Pahad ko mathi, sansar ko ramailo thau ma! ðï¸ #NepalBeauty

instruction: Dashain ko tihar ma garne kaam ko list bana.
output:
1. Gharsaphai ra rangoli banau.
2. Naya kapda kinera lagau.
3. Tika thapera ashirbad lina.
4. Mithai ra masu khaana ramailo garna.

instruction: Nepali ma ek emotional story lekha.
output: Ek din ek budhi aama bazar ma sasto kapda khojda thiin. Pasalele sabai maheno gareko kura dekhera bhane, 'Hajur afno jindagi ma kasari ita ramro man banayo?' Aama le hasera bhani, 'Jindagi ma kati dherai kura gumauna parcha, tar majale bacheko rahyo.'

instruction: Shopping ma jane manche lai ek tip de.
output: Budget fix garera matra jane, ani unnecessary items kina nabhana.

instruction: Ek din ko productive routine suggest gar.
output:
1. Morning ma early uthera yoga gar.
2. To-do list bana ani kaam prioritize gar.
3. Afternoon ma 10 min stretch gar.
4. Evening ma healthy dinner ra 30 min reading time rakh.

instruction: Nepali literature ko ek author ko barema lekha.
output: Laxmi Prasad Devkota Nepali literature ko maha kabi hun. Unko famous karya 'Muna Madan' le Nepali sahityama amar jagir banayo.

instruction: Mitho Nepali chai ko recipe de.
output:
1. Water ma tea leaves, sugar, ani aduwa rakhera boil gar.
2. Milk add garera 5 minutes lagi simmer gar.
3. Cup ma strain garera serve gar.

instruction: Ek simple workout plan diyera help gar.
output:
1. 5 min stretching.
2. 15 min cardio jastai jogging ya skipping.
3. 10 min bodyweight exercise, jastai push-up, squats, planks.
4. 5 min cool down.

instruction: Nepali school ma popular game ko name lekha.
output: Dandibiyo, Kabbadi, Gatta, Ra Jhyapki Lhaptai jasto khel haru popular hun.

instruction: Nepali ma ek eco-friendly lifestyle tip de.
output: Reusable shopping bag use gar, ani single-use plastic ko jagga ma biodegradable products ko prayog gar.

instruction: Nepali ma ek romantic poem lekha.
output:
Timi bina mero sansar andhakar,
Timi sangai mero mann pharkar.
Timi muskuraye jasto surya ko ujyalo,
Timi nai ho mero jindagi ko jhyal ra dhoka khulne palo.

instruction: Nepal ko ek historical site ko barema lekha.
output: Pashupatinath Temple Kathmandu ma chha ra Hindu dharm ma ekdamai mahatwapoorn mandir ho. Shiva Bhagwan lai samarpit yo mandir UNESCO World Heritage Site pani ho.

instruction: Nepali ma healthy snacks ko list bana.
output:
1. Makai (popcorn)
2. Chiya sanga roasted chana.
3. Dried fruits jastai kismis ra badam.
4. Fresh fruits jastai sita phal ra sun kosheli.

instruction: Nepali ma ek traffic rule explain gar.
output: Crosswalk ma pedestrians lai pahila jaan dinu parcha, ani red light ma gadaan garnu hudaina.

instruction: Nepali ma study tips suggest gar.
output:
1. Daily notes banaera revise gar.
2. 25-30 minutes padhera 5 minutes break le.
3. Morning ma padna easy topics rakhi, evening ma hard topics cover gar.

instruction: Nepali ma ek traditional festival ko barema lekha.
output: Holi Nepal ma khusi ra rang ko utsav ho. Yo parva spring ma maninchha ani dherai rang lagayera ek arka sanga khusi saath celebrate garincha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek gratitude message lekha.
output: Timro sahayog ra maya ko lagi dherai dhanyabad. Timi le dekhako support le jindagi ma dherai motivation diyeko chha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek travel safety tip de.
output: Afno luggage ma identification tag rakha ani cash bhanda card use garna try gar.

instruction: Ek dog training ko simple tip suggest gar.
output: Positive reinforcement ko lagi treat use gara ani command 'sit' sikau. Aba slowly repeat garera dog lai habituate gar.

instruction: Nepali ma ek DIY project ko idea share gar.
output: Old glass bottle lai paint ra lights le decorate garera night lamp ma banaunus.

instruction: Nepali ma meditation ko benefits explain gar.
output: Meditation le stress kam garcha, mind calm banauchha, ani focus badhaunchha. Regular practice le mental clarity aunchha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek common financial tip de.
output: Monthly savings ko lagi 20% income separate rakha ani unnecessary expenses kam gar.

instruction: Nepali ma ek short story suru gar.
output: Ek din Hari jungle ma gayeko thiyo. Usle ek sano biralo ko awaz suncha, ra usko saano muskan jindagi ko ekdamai ramailo suru bancha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek fitness goal define gar.
output: 2 mahina ma 5 kg weight loss garna, daily 30 min exercise garera achieve garna sakinchha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek polite email ko example bana.
output:
Subject: Request for Information

Dear Sir/Madam,

Kripaya malaai [specific topic] ko barema thap details provide garna saknuhunchha? Ma yo kurama dherai interested chu ra timely response ko lagi aasha garcha.

Thank you,
[Tapaiko Naam]

instruction: Nepali ma ek joke suggest gar.
output:
Teacher: Timro future ma k banne sochyo?
Student: Biralo!
Teacher: Kasto kura gareko? Kinna biralo?
Student: Aba sabai biralo laptop ma bascha ni!

instruction: Nepali ma ek self-care tip de.
output: Daily ko 30 minutes afno lagi rakha. Reading, meditation, ya music enjoy garera mind fresh rakhna sakchha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek recipe ko creative name suggest gar.
output: Jyanma Jhyalko Chowmein

instruction: Nepali ma ek creative business idea suggest gar.
output: Local Nepali product jastai dhaka topi, handmade jewelry online platform ma export garne business start garna sakinchha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek inspiring morning routine share gar.
output:
1. Subha 6 baje uthera ek glass warm pani piu.
2. 15 minutes yoga ya stretching gar.
3. Healthy breakfast jastai oats ya fruits khau.
4. Din ko goal set garera likha.

instruction: Ek Nepali proverb explain gar.
output: Yo proverb le tyo manche ko barema bhanchha, jasle thulo kura garcha, tara anta ma kehi garna sakdaina.

instruction: Nepali ma ek polite request bana.
output: Kripaya library ma ek copy book ma lagi reserve garna milchha ki?

instruction: Nepali ma ek travel destination suggest gar.
output: Adventure lover ko lagi Pokhara ko Sarangkot ra Annapurna Base Camp perfect destination ho. Trekking ani paragliding garna pani milcha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek formal invitation letter ko format de.
output:
Subject: Invitation to [Event Name]

Dear [Name],

Yo patra ko madhyam bata timilai [Event Name] ko lagi nimto dina cha. Event [date] ma, [time] ma, [venue] ma hune cha. Timro upasthiti le event ko showbhagya badcha.

Dhanyabad,
[Tapaiko Naam]

instruction: Nepali ma ek creative Instagram bio lekha.
output: Dreamer | Traveler | Nepali Vibes | Coffee Lover | Living life one smile at a time

instruction: Nepali ma ek funny riddle bana.
output:
Mero naam sunera bhagcha, ma afai uchinchu, ma ke ho?
Answer: Jhola (Bag)

instruction: Nepali ma ek new year wish bana.
output: Naya barsha ko dherai dherai subhakamana! Timro jindagi ramailo, khushi ra safalta le bhari rahos.

instruction: Nepali ma ek self-improvement tip suggest gar.
output: Daily ek naya skill seekhne prayas gar. Aba YouTube ya free resources ko sahayog le afno knowledge expand garna milcha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek healthy lunch recipe de.
output:
1. Brown rice lai pakaunus.
2. Saag, gajar, ani tarkari lai steam gar.
3. Grilled chicken ya paneer side ma rakh.
4. Sabai lai thik ma garnish garera serve gar.

instruction: Nepali ma ek short poem lekha nature ko barema.
output:
Hariyali jungle ko chara,
Kholako awaz sukunko dhara.
Nepal ko sundar pahad ma,
Ma hamesha jindagi ko sahara.

instruction: Nepali ma ek productivity app ko description bana.
output: Task Manager App le timro daily tasks organize garna madat garcha. Timle deadline set garera reminder ko lagi use garna milcha. Focus ra time management badhauna ekdum useful tool ho.

instruction: Nepali ma ek time management ko tip de.
output: Din ko suruma priority ko kaam identify garera top 3 tasks complete garne goal bana.

instruction: Nepali ma ek short joke lekha.
output:
Ek kukur bhancha: 'Ma bark garna chhodi, aba meow garna sikchu!'
Arko kukur bhancha: 'Yo ta trending challenge ho!'

instruction: Nepali ma ek positive affirmation suggest gar.
output: Ma confident ra capable chu. Mero sapana pura garna sakchu.

instruction: Nepali ma ek cultural event ko description bana.
output: Indra Jatra Kathmandu ma manincha ani yasko artha Indra Devata ko samman ho. Chariot pulling, Lakhey dance, ani lights le yo utsav dherai ramailo huncha.

instruction: Nepali ma ek gratitude ko example lekha.
output: Aaj ko din ma timro sahayog le mero kaam asar garna sakyo. Timilai dherai dhanyabad dinchhu!

instruction: Nepali ma ek tech gadget ko review de.
output: Yo smartwatch fitness tracking ma ramro cha. Step counting, heart rate monitoring, ra notification system sabai ramro tarika le kaam garcha. Battery life chai dherai efficient ho.

instruction: Nepali ma ek memorable childhood memory share gar.
output: School time ma Dashain ko bela sabaile ekai din ma tika lagna ko lagi holiday ko wait garthyo. Baajeko katha sunne ani ghumna jane moment sabai bhanda memorable thiyo.

instruction: Nepali ma ek fun activity describe gar.
output: Ekta chhoto trekking plan bana ra pasal bata makai lya. Top ma pughera barbecue garera dherai enjoy garna sakinchha!
